QuestData.Title: Unleashed Steel
QuestData.Description: Thank you... boss.$b$bI won't let you down! I didn't even try to sneak one of those low quality blades here that one of your peons placed right next to the cage. Which by the way was a pretty terrible idea and that thing should be moved before you get anyone less honorable in here.$b$bEnough talk, lets check this place out!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Morketh Bladehowl inside of Vol'jin's Pride in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: We have a lot of basic arms here but I'll get them improved in no time.$b$bThanks for giving me this chance.
